testimonials.name: Lego_Maestro
testimonials.comment: 5000% Vouch. I'm a Minecraft (Hypixel) Youtuber with over 140,000 subscribers (You can check my account to verify) and Diamond is the best. Always super nice and gets straight to the point with business. Highly reccomend him for a manager position but I am confident he'd be good at anything.

testimonials.name: NottZino
testimonials.comment: Diamond hooked me up with some streamer/youtubers. Had a really good results from diamond. Diamond is super interactive and helpful throughout the stages of advertisements.

testimonials.name: Jasmine
testimonials.comment: The user is extremely talented and has always been the ideal partner for someone like me who'd love for someone to take the wheel on the management part of the server as I do not have much time to do so. I definitely use and always use Diamond for management.
